name: Space: but smaller
description:
A multiplayer coop space shooter. No real gameplay loop, but some solid foundations built.

The main level is intended to be a procedurally generated A to B coop fight. This was the jam objective, while further gameplay is intended for implementation after.

Make sure to check out the spaceship!

---

State of the game:

  • Player controls working, networked over multiplayer
  • Spaceship controls working, no networking
  • Enemies spawning around the players as a test, networked
  • Main level procedural generation working and consistent across devices
  • Can shoot to kill enemies
  • Player and networked team HUD working, in sync
  • Player health exists, but they can not be hurt
